verses.kjv: Lord, thou hast been favourable unto thy land: thou hast brought back the captivity of Jacob.
verses.ct: LORD, you have shown kindness to your land; you have restored the fortunes of Jacob.

verses.kjv: Thou hast forgiven the iniquity of thy people, thou hast covered all their sin. Selah.
verses.ct: You have forgiven the guilt of your people and covered all their sin. Selah.

verses.kjv: Thou hast taken away all thy wrath: thou hast turned thyself from the fierceness of thine anger.
verses.ct: You have set aside all your wrath; you have pulled back from your burning anger.

verses.kjv: Turn us, O God of our salvation, and cause thine anger toward us to cease.
verses.ct: Restore us, God of our salvation, and let your anger toward us come to an end.

verses.kjv: Wilt thou be angry with us for ever? wilt thou draw out thine anger to all generations?
verses.ct: Will you stay angry with us forever? Will your anger stretch on through every generation?

verses.kjv: Wilt thou not revive us again: that thy people may rejoice in thee?
verses.ct: Won't you bring us back to life again, so that your people can celebrate in you?

verses.kjv: Shew us thy mercy, O LORD, and grant us thy salvation.
verses.ct: Show us your mercy, LORD, and give us your salvation.

verses.kjv: I will hear what God the LORD will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: but let them not turn again to folly.
verses.ct: I will listen to what God the LORD has to say, because he will speak peace to his people and to his faithful ones â€” but they must not return to foolishness.

verses.kjv: Surely his salvation is nigh them that fear him; that glory may dwell in our land.
verses.ct: Surely his salvation is near to those who deeply revere him, so that glory may settle in our land.

verses.kjv: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
verses.ct: Mercy and truth have come together; righteousness and peace have embraced each other.

verses.kjv: Truth shall spring out of the earth; and righteousness shall look down from heaven.
verses.ct: Truth will sprout up from the earth, and righteousness will look down from heaven.

verses.kjv: Yea, the LORD shall give that which is good; and our land shall yield her increase.
verses.ct: The LORD will indeed provide what is good, and our land will produce its harvest.

verses.kjv: Righteousness shall go before him; and shall set us in the way of his steps.
verses.ct: Righteousness will go ahead of him and will prepare the path for his steps.
